Translations.Text: Ni$ usan d imceggaen nne£ ar Iboahim, s ubecceo. Nnan: "tifrat"! Inna: "tifrat"! Ur iaaiiel ara ibbwi d aajmi icwin
Mi iwala ifassen nnsen ur d eeilen ara $uoes, iseassef iten, iugad iten. Nnan: "ur ppagwad, nekwni neppuceggaa ed ar ugdud n Lui
Tameiiut is tbedd, tevua. Nbecceo ip s Iseaq, akked Yaaqub, deffir Iseaq
Tenna: "a leif iw, day a d arwe$, nek d tam$aot, u argaz agi inu, wesser? Ayagi, s tidep, d lwehma
Nnan: "day twehmev di lameo n Oebbi? Aeunu n Oebbi, akked lbaoaka S, fellawen ay at uxxam. Ih, Neppa d Amaazuz, Mucaa
Mi s tekkes tugwdi i Iboahim, u iusa t id ubecceo, inumer a£ $ef ugdud n Lui
Iboahim, s tidep, ieellem, ippanez, isteooia
A Iboahim, ur keccem deg waya. Ni$ iusa d lameo n Mass ik. Nitni, a ten id ias uaaqeb, war tifrat
Mi usan imceggaen nne£ ar Lui, innu$ben, ur isai i$il a ten ifukk. Inna: "wagi d ass uwaio

Iusa d ugdud is, zeefen d $uoes. Llan, zik, xeddmen tucmitin. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Atent an issi, nitenti zeddigit, i kunwi. Eezbet i Oebbi, ur iyi peeccimet ar inebgawen iw. Day ur illi ara, garawen, urgaz aeesbi
Nnan: "ni$ teeoiv ur nesai leeqq deg issi k. Kecc, s tidep, teeoiv d acu neb$a
Inna: "a lemmer i wen zmire$, ne$ sai$ tayep ioehden

Nnan: "a Lui, nekwni d imceggaen n Mass ik. Ur k id ppawven. Oue akked twacult ik, deg iv. Yiwen degwen ur d itezzi! Kkes ed tameiiut ik. Neppat, s tidep, a ppepwwet s wayen ara ten iwwten. Ih, ppaaud nnsen, tauebeit. Ni$ tqeob ed tuebeit
Mi d iusa lameo nne£, Nesredm ip. Nesse$li d fellas abruri n yieoa ibelbaven n talaxt
Pwanesxen ar Mass ik. Nitni, ur baiden i imednas
